sec.p: Genotype by Sequencing was used for the assessment of genetic variability observed between RJF and the domesticated breeds. We have previously optimized SNP detection through genotype by sequencing using the PstI enzyme [ 38]. For this genotyping, DNA was collected from animals from different breeds, reduced with PstI digestion, barcoded (to individualize the fragmented DNA), pooled among individuals from the same breeds, and then sequenced in Illumina platform (SciLife Lab, Uppsala, Sweden), following our previously described protocol [ 38]. Genetic variability in the form of single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) and copy number variations (CNVs) were assessed between the RJF and the domesticated breeds.
